# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="6424b-102">Změna jazyka, formátu data a času nebo časového pásma v Outlooku na webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6424b-103">V horní části stránky vyberte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="6424b-104">**Nastavení:** > **Zobrazení všech nastavení aplikace Outlook**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6424b-105">Vyberte **obecný** > **jazyk a čas**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="6424b-106">Vyberte jazyk, který chcete použít.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="6424b-107">Vyberte **Uložit**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6424b-108">Další informace najdete [v tématu Změna nastavení časového pásma a jazyka v Outlooku na webu](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6424b-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
